text:
DNSFilter | QA/Release Manager | REMOTE (within 6 hours of EST)| Full Time | https://www.dnsfilter.com/about/careers/

DNSFilter provides cloud-based threat protection and content filtering via DNS.

We're looking for someone to 'project manage' our QA Process - starting with manual testing, working with and creating github issues for our engineers to cover that manual testing with automated tests.

Then we're looking for this role to take over the Release management process. Prioritizing what will be included in releases, merging, testing.

You can find more details about the role on our website. Willing to work with someone with project management skills, manual QA skills, and minimal coding experience.

I'm CTO, feel free to email me via email in profile.
